job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. A Master’s degree is preferred.

jd:
Role: Oracle Cloud DBA Advanced

Job Location: San Jose, CA (Onsite)

Duration: 12+ Months

Hiring- Contract

Description

Education: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. A Master’s degree is preferred.

Experience: Minimum of 7 years of experience as an Oracle DBA, with a proven track record of managing and optimizing large-scale Oracle database environments.

Technical Skills:
- In-depth knowledge of Oracle database architecture, administration, and performance tuning.
- Proficient in Oracle Real Application Clusters (RAC), Oracle Data Guard, and Oracle GoldenGate.
- Experience with Oracle Enterprise Manager (OEM) and other database management tools.
- Strong knowledge of SQL and PL/SQL programming languages.

Certifications: Oracle Certified Professional (OCP) or Oracle Certified Master (OCM) certification is highly desirable.

Soft Skills:
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Detail-oriented with a strong focus on accuracy and quality.
